errors.error_description: In the 'Tab Completion' section, the example command for installing bash completions incorrectly points to '/etc/bash_completion.d/keyring'. While this path exists on some systems, the more standard path mentioned in the surrounding text is '/usr/share/bash-completion/completions/keyring'.
In the 'Installation - Linux' section, the instruction to install the dbus dependency via pip is 'pip install python-dbus', which is an incorrect package name. The correct package is 'dbus-python'.
correction_candidates: Suggest running `sudo apt-get install python3-dbus` instead of using pip.
